history: TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
TTS <speak> Great! I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. </speak>
TTS Where are you going?For example, you can say I'm going to Squirrel Hill
USER I'm going to Children's Hospital.
TTS Okay, going to upmc children's hospital of pittsburgh.
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university.
TTS When do you wanna travel?
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 39 minutes, and you will take 2 busses..
Walk for about 3 mins to Forbes avenue Opposite Craig Street.
Take the 61B ,to Forbes avenue at Murray avenue. It will depart at 7:16pm..
Walk for about 1 min to Murray avenue at Forbes avenue..
Take the 64 ,to Penn avenue at 44th St . . It will depart at 7:30pm..
Walk for about 2 mins to 4401 Penn avenue..
TTS <speak>if you missed anything, please say repeat, else say continue</speak>
